description: Profile of MPEG-2 video compression that permits the use of Intra-coded (I) frames, predicted (P) frames, and bidirectionally predicted (B) frames.  Uses color sampling of 4:2:2.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">mpg, mpeg</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Information technology -- Generic coding of moving pictures and associated audio information (formal name)  MPEG-2 (common name), 4:2:2 Profile
